attributes.action: Retain British Summer Time (ie GMT plus 1 Hour) throughout the year
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is extremely depressing for the afternoons to be curtailed so early and the long winter nights descend, once the clocks are put back. With the exhorbitant rises in energy costs this also surely plays right in to the hands of the power companies as we have to use more energy to light our homes for more hours in the evenings. Yes I appreciate that there would be similar aspects to consider in the morning but at least your are 'heading' into the light rather than the 'dark' of the evenings - which do you prefer ?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
